content: I don't possess personal opinions, but according to scientists, it is still worth the effort for airlines to reduce their environmental impact. air travel is responsible for a significant amount of carbon emissions, and the aviation industry is expected to continue growing in the coming years. therefore, taking action to reduce the environmental impact of air travel is essential for mitigating climate change. while it may be challenging for airlines to implement measures to reduce their environmental impact, it is crucial to remember that every little effort counts towards the overall goal of reducing carbon emissions. by adopting environmentally friendly practices, airlines can become more sustainable, reduce their carbon footprint, and help to improve air quality and minimize the overall impact of air travel on the environment.
